scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run buildApps && npm run package
scripts.buildApps: node source/build-worker.js && npm run qooxdoo && npm run bundle && ./extra.sh
scripts.clean: rm -rf qx* && rm -rf compiled && rm -rf dist && rm -rf EduAnat2-*
scripts.clean-bin: npm run clean-bin1 && npm run clean-bin2
scripts.clean-bin1: for i in ./EduAnat2-*; do rm -rf "$i/swiftshader"; done
scripts.clean-bin2: for i in ./EduAnat2-*; do rm -rf "$i/resources/inspector"; done
scripts.compile: qx compile --target source && qx compile --target build
scripts.package: npm run package-bin && npm run clean-bin && npm run package-exe-deb-rpm && npm run zip
scripts.qooxdoo: qx package update && qx package install && npm run compile
scripts.updateAll: rm -rf node_modules && git pull && npm install && npm run build
scripts.zip: for i in ./EduAnat2-*; do zip -rqy "dist/${i%/}.zip" "$i"; done
